SQL Insert Generator - Java/SQL

Generates T-SQL insert statements, based on user input and populates with randomly generated data. This project was started to make database based assignments easier, by removing the requirement of having to manually input data to the database.

KitCourier - Java/SQL

Order and delivery system. Builders can use the application to order specfic items to local delivery point within a construction site. Couriers will collect and deliver the items to the selected delivery point.

Vitamin++ - ASP.NET

Vitamin++ is a site about vitamins. It contains a shop and shoping cart system. User authenication system, blog/chat system and a content management system. A calorie counter to track daily calorie in-take
